summary: Bruno, an architect with a great life, is hired to build an iconic landmark, and as he works with a gay history teacher named Fer, an unexpected and intense romance starts to blossom.
cast: Francisco Celhay|Emilio Edwards|Daniela Ramírez|Matías Torres|Sergio Hernández|Marcial Tagle|Renee Alamo|Camilo Aravena|Cristian Bamaza|Jorge Bautelicos|Daniel Blanco|Catalina Brijo|Javiera Brijo|Florencia Bustos|Ignacio Bustos|Joaquin Bustos|Rodrigo Carcamo|Francisco Carrasco|Rodrigo Castillo|Carlos Cid|Emir Cifuentes|Alejandro Contreras|Danny Cortes|Daniela Cross|David DeFlores|Dario Difigo|Camila José Donoso|Cristian Errazuriz|Leonardo Falcón|Alejandro Ferreira|Carolina Flores|Constanza Franco|Ignacio Fredes|Italo Gallardo|Isidora Gamboa|Catalina Garcia|Marinela Garcia|Cristian Garin|Francesca Garin|Cristian Gomez|Florencia Gomez|Alejandro Gonzalez|Nicolas Gonzalez|Vida Gonzalez|Tobias Handschin|Tomas Henriquez|Eduardo Nicolay Islay|Daniela Jofré|Camila Karl|Isabel Lillo|Pablo Llanos|Gustavo Lopez|Wilfredo Marcelo|Benjamin Marchant|Sebastian Molina|Fabian Morales|Francesc Morales|Cristian Munoz|Analí Muñoz|Elizabeth Noper|Camila Ortega|Marcarena Osorio|Fernando Parat|Tania Perez|Ricardo de la Piedra|Stephanie Preller|Jony Quispe|Ampero Rebolledo|Edwin Reyes|Spiro Rigoletti|Tomas Riveros|Roxana Rodriguez|Tiare Rojas|Debora Roman|Pilar Ronderos|Fernando Ruiz|Farid Salinas|Roberto Santelices|Loreto Santibanez|Domingo Del Saute|Dario Segui|Elsa Serrano|Zhang Shenyuan|Paola Silva|Paloma Taral|Magdalena Traub|Zigor Uzcanga|Mauro Vaca|Fernando Velasquez|Martin Velasquez|Rodrigo Villaseca|Antonio Zisis
title: En la Gama de los Grises
